talk_text:
W-Wait a second.
I have no idea what
you're talking about.

Isn't Void Dark
absorbing energy right now?

We're trembling in fear, no thanks to him.
So this time we all agreed to
remove the cause of our anxiety!

Wait! You all agreed? 
So you agreed, too?!
But I'm still here!

Yup! Sadly, I don't have a choice.
This is our little secret, right, Christo? ♥

How did it end up like this...? 
I can't clear the suspicions around me 
until I kill Void Dark myself...

Yeah... So you'd better
hurry up, I suppose?
Alright, good luck to you!
...Oh, my gosh.
Hehehe... I've been waiting for you pieces of garbage.

You've got guts, coming up to us knowing 
that we'll beat you up, you little brat.

Hehehe... It's just good manners to greet 
your guests, even unwanted ones.

Majorita.
Why does Void Dark want to absorb all 
this energy?

To unify Netherworlds and create a utopia for demons.
Obviously, the more energy, the better.
You have murdered so many demons, yet you're claiming to create a utopia for them?

Isn't survival of the fittest the common sense?
Those who were killed just don't deserve it.
That's it.
You're wrong, plip!

What would a naive and carefree kid
know about this world and how it works?

I'll punish you
really harshly today!
Now you super prepare yourself, Majorita!!

Hmhmhm... Don't be hasty.
Let's enjoy the opening act for now.

Majorita
summons Rabbit
Corpses!
They are...

They are the citizens of Toto Bunny!
They are the ones who lived in this castle
and tried to protect me from Majorita!

My Overload Skill, "Broken Faith Magia".
How do you like it?

What will you do now? Why not just smash them if they're standing in your way?
They're only corpses after all.

Obey or die... 
If you choose to obey, I'll let you
join my corpses. Hmhmhm...
Master...U...sa...

I-I'm here!
Usalia is here for you, plip!
Take... this... Take... this...

The rabbit corpse
hands Usalia a note.

Is this...?
A letter from my father?

What does it say?
Read it, Li'l Usa.

This is...
the recipe to the special
sweet curry, plip.

That curry 
that I told my parents 
was yucky.

Usalia. 
Can I take a look at it?
Th-This is...!
...Huh?

The mixture of spices
is well tuned. It covers up the spiciness and brings out 
the sweetness of vegetables to the maximum...

This recipe was specially made for
the kids who hate curry... 
It's a crystallization of hard work and wisdom...

They most likely tried and failed many times. 
They must've had great tenacity... No, great love, to get it to this level.

Your parents weren't mad at you.
They sure didn't hate you...

They loved you more than anyone in this world.
Without their deepest love for you, they could have never come up with this recipe.
Mother... father...

That curry...
was actually
really delicious, plip.

Thanks to that curry, now I'm able to enjoy curry.
Thank you... Thank you very much...

Demons possess love...?
This can't be!

...Why are these people doing the complete 
opposite of what I expect them to do?

Don't let them fool you...
You cannot be fooled...
They aren't demons.

...It's no use hiding.
I've no idea what you're up to, but show yourself already!

Awww, you've found me.
Great job!
Majorita is in great trouble!
Majorita!!

Dammit...
You're toying with us, aren't you?

Hmhmhm... You're all idiots.
You're pointlessly throwing your lives away. 
What else I call you, besides idiots?

It's not up to you
to decide whether it's pointless or not.
It's up to us.

How presumptuous...
I'll make sure that you'll never be able to talk again.
Kill and Recycle.

Majorita summons forth
Usalia's parents again!
Father! Mother!

...Usalia.
You're the one who will make this choice.
Whatever you decide, we'll support you.

...Usalia doesn't want to fight, plip!
I love my parents!
I love them more than anyone else...!

I'm sorry.
I'm so sorry, everyone...
I get it, Li'l Usa.
It can't be helped.

Master withstood the torture given by the Lost.
So can I...!

Don't give up, everyone.
If we can withstand their attacks, we'll have a chance to turn the tides.

Hmhmhm... 
You really are idiots.

I have to agree with Majorita on this one!
What's wrong with everyone!?

At this rate, you really will die!
Are you really okay with that?

Now that you're trying to get yourselves killed, I guess I'll grant your wish.
Kill them all!!!!
Usa...lia...
Father?!
You must... fight...

...Don't... worry... 
about... us...

Usa...lia...
We... love... you...
...My... beloved... daughter...
Mother!!

Wh-What? What's happening?
These corpses are disobeying me?!
I-Is this... a miracle?!

No, it's not a miracle.
The love from Usalia's parents
has suppressed the evil energy.

Don't be ridiculous...!!
Love?!

If you love your daughter that much, I'll turn her into a corpse right now!!
Die little girl!

In a rage, Majorita
starts attacking Usalia!

But, Usalia's parents
sacrifice themselves
to protect their daughter from Majorita's attack...

Father!
Mother!!

...Why.
You just won't...
stop irritating me...

I'm so mad... Mad mad mad 
mad mad mad mad!!!!
Usalia...

I'm fine, Killia.
I can fight.

I'm not hesitant any more.
I will defeat Majorita.

For my mother and father
who loved me till their very end!
I will defeat Majorita!!
A blinding radiant light shines from Usalia.

The evil spell Majorita cast on Usalia 
disappeared from her body...

Usalia turned the spell into strength, and learned 
the Overload Skill, Murmur of Rage!

Th-That's impossible...!
Not only did she repel my spell, but she 
turned it into an Overload Skill!?

Nice, Li'l Usa. 
But I won't let you have Majorita.
I'm gonna finish her!

On the other hand... 
it wouldn't be half bad to work together. 
Whaddaya say, Li'l Usa?

Yeah, we'll be the strongest tag team!
Let's super do it, plip!!

Hahahaha! 
Then let's get super rowdy
and make super noise!

I can't... 
I can't believe this trash...
It can't be...

Panchos... Everyone...
I've avenged Scorching Flame.

Father. Mother.
Finally, Usalia...

Watch out!
She's still alive!
Huh...?
Too slow.

Majorita caught Red Magnus off guard
and ambushed him from behind!
Watch out, plip!!

Usalia tries to protect Red Magnus but is poisoned by Majorita.
2D animation: Usalia is attacked by Majorita.

Usalia stands in front of Red Magnus!
Majorita's claw
has stabbed Usalia's back!
*Cough*
Li'l Usa!!

Hehehe... How do you like that?
The taste of this special venom?
Ar...argh...!!

Y-You!!
Are you trying to piss me off...
I will murder you!!!!!!

You don't have time for that. 
If you don't treat that little girl's wound immediately, she won't last an hour.

Well, there's no possible way to neutralize 
that poison in this Netherworld.

At least savor 
the little time she has left. 
Hmhmhmhmhm...

U-Usalia!
Stay with us!
Uh... ahh...

Bro! She'll be okay, right?!
You can save her, right, bro?!

Kgrh! 
What should I do...?

The screen fades in.
Background: the universe.
The narrator explains the situation of the universe.

The screen remains dark and subtitles appear.
EP 10: "The Memorable Special Sweet Curry" - END

Hey, Usalia!
Usalia! Stay with us!

Usalia's face is turning pale!
Her body starts twitching as her breathing becomes intermittent!
Her life is in great danger!

I-It's no use, bro!
She's not responding!

Is there...
Is there anything we can do?!

Usalia, who's new ability has just awoken, has weakened this much in just a 
few minutes...

D-Don't tell me... 
Usalia's young life is 
slipping away...

Stop it, sis!
Don't say that!

...Everyone, please step back.
Let me save Usalia.

Christo uses his Angel skill.
2D animation: Christo's Angel skill.

The dazzling, soft light from Christo
gently envelops Usalia's body...

Huh?!
Wh-What's that? That light...?!
Th-That skill...!!
Wh-What happened...?

Phew... 
I was worried that it may not work, but the result turned out well.

Christo! Thank you
for saving me, plip!

...Don't mention it.
You're an important member of the Rebel Army.
It's only natural that I saved you.
By the way, Christo.

The magic you used... It's awfully similar 
to that of the Angel Magic 
I've read about in literature.
A-Angel Magic?!

Heh, heh, hahahahaha! Me? An angel?
Y-You must be joking, right!?
That's preposterous! Surely you jest...!

Seraphina.
Christo just saved
my life. Please don't tease him, plip.

If Christo was really an angel, there's no way he would have saved
a demon like me, plip.

...That's true, though.
I've never
heard of an angel helping a demon.

Oh right. 
This man... Christo, is a true Overlord.
Killia...

Title
Killia - EP 11: "Netherworld Extinction"

What are you doing here?
Protecting this magical spear is my duty.
You're not needed.
Majorita, I heard you were severely injured by the Rebel Army.

Hah, I'm not like you.
I just severely injured one of them 
with a special venom.
If you mean Usalia, the heir of Toto Bunny, she's still alive.

Y-You're lying...!
There's no way to cure
that poison in this Netherworld!

...You just
don't believe anyone.

...Of course I do. The only person I believe is 
Lord Void Dark, who turned my life 
around when I was orphaned by war.
Is that so...

If you understand, then get the hell out 
of my face, Bloodis.
Just when Christo was about to set out, his mobile phone rang.

Christo answered
the call impatiently.

Hello, hello!
Long time no see, Christo!
How ya doin'?

Ugh... 
It's not long at all.
Besides, your voice really annoys me.

Ah...? Really...?
Because I have something very important to say.
What's that?

Ah, you see? Our supervisor found that
you're now
with the demons, Christo. Teehee! ♥
What?
Meanwhile, the Anti-Netherworld Annihilation Weapon, Armageddon, is about to be launched.

W-Wait a second.
You know that I'm here, yet you're still going to launch the missile?!

Yeah, of course. They came to the conclusion that 
as Void Dark's spy, there's 
no reason to help you.

But I was framed for that!
That is completely not fair!
Is this truly how angels should act?

Unfortunately, that's exactly how we're gonna act. 
However, there's still one way to save you.

To ensure the launch to be successful, we need Void Dark's
location.

Christo.
 You can clearly see where he is, right
? With your Clairvoyance?

Of course, the supervisor will
give you something in return.
If you help us out, your suspicion of being a spy will be lifted.

Suspicion of being a spy...
I've never been a spy!

But you know? You don't really have a choice, do you?
I don't think there's another way
that you'll survive, Christo.

If you launch the missile, not only Void Dark
but the surrounding Netherworlds will be wiped out, too, right?

Probably, yes.
Armageddon packs a huge punch.
...Can I have a little time to think about this?

Sure, but you don't have much time. 
The deal expires in 24 hours.
24 hours...

I'll be waiting for your answer. 
Ciao.
Why so serious, Christo?
Whoaaa!!?

Why are you panicking like that?
I heard something about launching some sort of missile.

N-No, it's nothing!
I was just thinking how to defeat Void Dark.
Launching a missile could be a safe bet...

Let's think about that later.
Toto Bunny's energy is being absorbed 
while we're talking like this.

I agree with Zeroken.
This time, we will defeat Majorita
and save Toto Bunny.

Thank you very much, everyone, plip!
Please lend Usalia your powers!

Right on, Li'l Usa!
I owe that brat a little something too! 
I can't stand losing to her all the time.

Then let's pull it together 
and get revenge!!

Here you are, warriors of the Rebel Army.
I've been waiting for you.

B-Bloodis...!!
What a bad timing.

Zeroken...
Let's use that final skill one more time.

I'm ready, bro!
This time we'll bring Master back!!

Oh. You think you're strong enough to challenge me?
You underestimate me.
Let's go! Zeroken!
I'm ready, bro!!
Ultimate Demon Techniques! Final skill!!
Avidya Holy Water!! Haaaaaaaaaaa!!
2D animation: Zeroken successfully using that skill.

Killia and Zeroken used Avidya Holy Water together!
The energy blast
overwhelmed Bloodis in no time!
Hmph!
Animation that Bloodis blocks their attack.

However, Bloodis
blocks their attack effortlessly!
It didn't work at all!
What?!

Damnit! Why?!
Why isn't it working?!

Fool!!
Because you're too inexperienced!!

Ah!!
I-I'm sorry, Master!!

Don't be confused, Zeroken.
This man is not Goldion.

Now, it's my turn.
Are you ready?
Please wait a second, Lord Demon General Bloodis.

The defense of the magical spear
was entrusted to my Master, Lady Majorita.
Please leave them to us.

...Alright. 
Take care of these novices.
...Your name is Killia, right?

If you don't show me
your true power the next time we meet, then I'll not pull my punches like this again.

It's you guys, right?
You must be the outlaws
who harmed my master Majorita.

That's beyond forgiveness.
You shall pay with your lives.

Bro.
Is what Master-- I mean, Bloodis said bugging you?

I couldn't learn the Final Skill, so I ran away. I'm a novice. 
No matter what I do, nothing is going to change that.

Why...
Why won't it activate!?

It appears you are not yet ready to 
learn the Final Skill.
Krgh! Why is that...?!

Don't be hasty, Killia.
We are demons, and our heart is filled with evil intentions.

But when we get rid of them
and make our hearts pure, we'll be able to use the Final Skill of the Ultimate Demon Techniques.

It's all in your heart.
You must open up your heart, Killia.

Hmph... 
That sounds convincing, but you're just scared, aren't you?

So you made up all that nonsense
and won't teach me the final skill.

I was wondering what you're going to say.
At this rate, it'll be a long time
before you learn the final skill.
Well, if you don't want to teach me, then I'll force you to!!
...Fine.

Killia attacks Goldion!
And Goldion...
doesn't block!!

Killia's fist lands on Goldion's ribs.
2D battle animation.
Ugh!!

Killia's fist
thrusts into Goldion's
ribs!!

...Why? Why didn't you dodge it?!
You could have dodged that...

You could become the strongest ever...
But you should only use your fists for the ones you love...

When you discover the true meaning of your fists...
you'll become the strongest Overlord...
Killia ran away from Goldion.

I haven't progressed a bit since then.
Like Bloodis said, I'm a novice...

Christo's phone rings again...
Christo answers the call from his supervisor.

Yoohoo, little Christo! 
I think you've probably figured it out, so I called you...
...There's something that I want to discuss with you.

It's true that
my Clairvoyance
can almost locate Void Dark's exact location.

But I don't think we need a mass-destruction
weapon like Armageddon to resolve this problem.
Instead, we can choose another way to minimize the collateral damage.

Why is that? 
Why would an angel about the Netherworld?
That's pretty unusual.
Y-You have a point, but...

Besides, what if your "another way"
doesn't kill Void Dark? What will happen then?
He'll surely bite back, right?

To make sure that our attack kills Void Dark, we need your Clairvoyance
to guide our Armageddon.

...I'm sorry.
Please give me some more time.

Why am I hesitating?
This can take out Void Dark
and lift the suspicion around me...
Why am I so upset about this plan...?
Why are you just standing there?

Is something bothering you, Christo?
I'm all ears, if you'd like to tell me about it, plip.
...It's nothing.

Hey, Christo.
It can't be nothing.
You're obviously troubled, right?

Christo probably have used
too much energy when he saved Usalia
, and he must be tired, plip.
Usalia...

Christo.
I'm not asking what's on your mind.
But if you really have a problem, we're all here for you, okay?

My bro is right, Christo.
We're your allies.
(Please stop, everyone...)
(You're all demons, but why are you being so nice to me...?)

(If you were really
the cold-hearted and cruel demons I imagined you'd be, I wouldn't be so upset...)

(What...
What should I do...?)

The screen remains dark.
Sound effect: Christo's phone rings.

Hesitant, Christo
answers the call.

You have four hours left.
You better start evacuating 
or you won't make it in time.

Hmm...? Why are you so concerned?
You can say goodbye to those lowly demons. 
Aren't you happy?
Lowly...

Hm, are you mad?
But you said so, yourself. 
Demons are lowly.

Th-That's what I used to think...!
But now we fight together as allies...!

Oh?
Really... You're allies now...?

No, no, I merely misspoke.
How should I put this...

Oh my, how childish. 
I didn't think I'd ever hear those words 
from you, Christo...
You might actually be a spy...
Like I said...!

Hahaha, I was just kidding.
Ciao.

Allies...
Demons as my allies...
What am I saying...?
Hmmm....
Argh... Hmm...

In his angst, Christo fails to notice 
that his horns have fallen on the ground!

Christo, Christo.
Your horns fell on the ground, plip.

Oh, pardon me.
I hadn't noticed.
Oh, hey, this is not what it seems.

I see. 
Something must be really troubling you.
What do you mean, Sir Killia?

...There's a type of demon whose horns
fall off when they're under great stress.

I can't really recall their name, Christo.
But it's a surprise to me that you're one of them.
Killia...

Don't be too stressed.
Please get some rest, Christo.

Thank you, everyone.
But if I don't hurry, Armageddon will...

Parma Melon? Sounds delicious.
I'd like to have a try.
Uh, no, it's not that...

Ah, forget it!
Let's get rid of Majorita first!
(It's very important to get Majorita, but there is actually something far more dire going on...)

(If Armageddon is launched, this place won't 
be safe, either.)

(I should tell everyone the truth... 
But I can't do that without revealing 
my true identity...)

(In that case, I should just escape...Wait, if I actually can do that, then why 
does the idea repulse me so?)

(*Sigh* 
What has happened to me? 
My old self would've escaped right away...)

(This is all your guys' fault for not 
acting like demons!)
(If you were shrewder and more dislikable, then I wouldn't have any problem simply sacrificing you...)

The magical spear is just ahead of us.
And Majorita, too.

Great!
Let's go and get her!!
We'll put an end to this, plip!

Wait! 
Before that, we need to settle another problem...
Has he seen through my cover...?!
...I have to eat.

In the blink of an eye, a whole bunch of food appears in front of Killia!
A big pile!

I've been consuming a lot of calories lately...
Don't worry, this won't take long. I'll be done in three minutes.

What? 
Do you want some, too, Christo?

No, but... 
I have something to tell you, everyone.

After this battle with Majorita... 
I'll leave the Rebel Army.

Whoa! Whoa! Wait!
What are you even talking about, Christo?!
You're the one who founded this army!!

...It's an order from my supervisor.
I must go back immediately.
Whatever it is, just ignore it!

We are demons.
Who cares about orders?

...Please!!
Just leave me alone!
Please don't make it harder for me that it is right now.

You guys are demons...Demons...! 
Why do you care about others so much!? 
You all are way too selfless!

Christo.
I used to think that demons were heartless, and couldn't possibly care about others.

But....
Demons do have the capacity to care about others. 
It takes a warm heart, and a pure heart.

You seem to be denying the possibility that 
demons are capable of caring about others. Is that true?

To me, it seems like you care more about the well-being 
of your allies than any of us.

Th-That's not the case! 
I'm caring? That's preposterous...

It's the truth, plip!
You saved 
Usalia's life!
B-Because...

Christo, try facing your heart
one last time.

And if you come to the same decision, I won't stop you again.
You'll be free to leave the Rebel Army.

...I understand.
It's true that I'm still confused.
I'll find my answer after the next battle.

Have you no shame in coming here? Hmhmhm... 
Who wants to be the next to die from my poison?

What are you talking about?
... Usalia!
I'm here, plip!!

H-How can it be?!
How could you possibly survive my poison?

Majorita! You killed my mother and father!
We'll put an end to this, plip!!

Hmph. 
I'd be a little worried if you did this by yourself. 
Let's be super flashy about ending this!
I'm here, plip!!

Usalia and Red Magnus charge at Majorita.
2D battle animation.

Usalia and Red Magnus
charge at Majorita simultaneously!
Their power collides and bursts forth!

Let's follow!
And put an end to this!
Okay, bro!

Hmhmhm... Are you sure?
See? These two are in trouble.
Uh...aaarrrhhhhh!!
Gyaa...aaaaahhhhh!!

Usalia and Red Magnus
have entered into a furious rage!!

Wh-What's happening?
You poisoned them?!

With my Overload Skill, Broken Faith Magia... 
I can freely control my opponents
by injecting them with my blood.

With this ultimate power, I can control corpses 
and bring pain to living beings.

I gave them a tiny dose of it, but it's 
enough to make them kill each other. 
Hmhmhmhmhm...

Fwah-hahaha! 
Now, kill each other!!

...My? What happened? 
They stopped moving.

Wh-What are you guys doing!? 
Hurry up and fight each other! Kill each other!

Majorita. You may not know, but there is something
that even surpasses the power
of an Overlord. It's allies.

A-Allies...!?
I won't allow such a power! I won't!

Majorita. You should admit your failure.
There's no way that you can defeat us.

Christo uses his Angel Magic.
A dazzling radiance appears from Christo.

The dazzling radiance from Christo gently envelops 
Usalia and Red Magnus
.

Wh-What's that?!
What's that warm light...?!
Wh-What happened...?
What has happened...?

Awesome!
I knew you could do it, Christo!!

Why...? There is no way to destroy my 
"Broken Faith". 
The only way would be if...
A-Are you an ang...
...I'm Overlord Christo, Chief Tactician of the Rebel Army.
Urgh!

She disappeared...?
Or did she vanish for good?

Father! Mother! 
Usalia finally did it, plip!
Now I have no regrets...

Oh come on. Hey now, what are you saying, Li'l Usa? 
Don't you still have an important duty?

Yeah. Just like this musclehead, you still need to
restore your homeworld, right?
Usalia? Restore Toto Bunny...?

Who else is going to do that?
Avenging them is not your
parents' true wish.

They wanted you to become
a qualified Overlord and
protect Toto Bunny.

...As long as
I could avenge my parents and my people, I didn't care if I died.

But now I'm the Overlord of Toto Bunny.
I can't think that way anymore.

Mother... Father...
Usalia will become a splendid Overlord.
So... Please watch over me...

Christo.
Thank you so much, plip.

Even that Demon General Majorita
has no defense against an angel.

A-Angel?!
What's that supposed to mean?
I'm a genuine Overlord, right?

Alas, I'm so sorry.
Pardon me. Oh-hohohoho!

So, let's hear your answer, Christo.
Where is your heart now?
Are you still going to leave the Rebel Army?

Christo!
I want to keep fighting together with you
like this, plip!

Hm...Hehehehe...
Ah-hahahaha!!

Me, leave the rebel army? You must be joking. 
If I, the Chief Tactician, were to leave, then 
who would keep this chaotic group together?

You're depending on me too much.
That's why I said I would leave the army, to make you more independent.

I-Is that so, plip?
So you'll stay here and
fight with us, plip?
...Yeah, of course I will.

Well, looks like everything is
back to normal, bro.
Yes...

(Christo was able to find his answer.
But I...)

Christo talks with his supervisor.
He is not hesitant at all.

...So, I have come to a decision.
I refuse to participate.

Hee... It's your decision to disobey
the higher-ups, but how do 
you plan to stop Armageddon?

Please tell the higher-ups that if they don't 
stop the launch of the Anti-Netherworld 
Annihilation Weapon, Armageddon, then...

I'll leak this information to Void Dark...
As well as the exact coordinates of Celestia.
If Void Dark knew that, he would gladly destroy Celestia.

But then you'll become a spy 
for real.

I don't care about it any more.
Right now, I have no attachment to Celestia.

...You've changed, Christo. 
It feels like you've grown up.

If I've changed, then it's all because 
of those demons.

They're reckless, stubborn, and forceful, yet they care about their allies... 
They are all irreplaceable.
Christo has really matured!!
Christo learned the Overload Skill (an Angel skill, actually), Evangel of Purity!!
The magical spear in Toto Bunny has been destroyed as well...

Warriors of the Rebel Army...
Enjoy your victory for now.

But, will you be able to overcome your next 
challenge...?

The screen fades in.
Background: the universe.
The narrator explains the state of the universe. 
※ Voice Narration.

Subtitle
	EP 11: Netherworld Extinction - END

The heroes, who had overcome challenges one after another, are about to open the revolving gate to the ancient ruins
at the depths of Arcadia when...
A pitch-dark arm appears from inside the gate...!

Da-da-da-dun! 
The title will be...

Netherworld Special!
The Tragedy Inside the Ancient Ruins!
Who is the Living Armor's prey!?

Hmph! There's no need to worry about that Living Armor. 
My bro and I will protect us all!
Hey, what are you doing here?
Flonne called us in here, telling us to protect #NAME#.

Our opponent this time
could be tough, so I asked them to help you out!

Then everyone is here.
Let's proceed with caution.
Oooh--!

Why are you
being so quiet, bro? Are you hungry?

No, that Living Armor reminds
me of... Him...

Want me to take a guess?
You mean Demon General Bloodis, right?
Yes.

He has an impressive name.
